versions.title: Persistent absences for all pupils
versions.summary: Percentage of pupils in state-funded primary, state funded secondary and special schools that were persistently absent (those absent for 10% of schooling sessions) during the academic year, England (state-funded schools), academic years 2008/09 - 2021/22.
versions.description: This dataset shows the percentage of pupils in state-funded primary, state funded secondary and special schools that were persistently absent (those absent for 10% of schooling sessions) during the academic year, in England (state-funded schools), for academic years 2008/09 - 2021/22.

columns.name: period
columns.description: The time period associated with the observation.

columns.name: areacd
columns.description: The statistical geography code of the observation being measured.

columns.name: areanm
columns.description: The statistical geography of the observation being measured.

columns.name: value
columns.titles: Proportion of all pupils with persistent absences
columns.description: Observation value of all pupils with persistent absences.

columns.name: measure
columns.description: Measure type asscoiated with the observation value.

columns.name: unit
columns.description: Unit of measure of observation value.

columns.name: lower_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, lower bound.

columns.name: upper_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, upper bound.

columns.name: observation_status
columns.description: Additional context to the observation value, if needed.
